sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import style from './Keyboard.module.css'; import * as PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const Keyboard = (props) => { React.useEffect(() => { let pressedButton = document.getElementById(props.lastLetter.toLowerCase()); if (!pressedButton) return null; pressedButton.classList.remove(`${style.wrongKey}`); pressedButton.classList.remove(`${style.correctKey}`); if (props.mistakeHappened) { setTimeout(() => pressedButton.classList.add(`${style.correctKey}`), 0); } else { setTimeout(() => pressedButton.classList.add(`${style.wrongKey}`), 0); } handler(props.numberOfMistakes); }); return (
`

) } Keyboard.propTypes = { lastLetter: PropTypes.string, mistakeHappened: PropTypes.bool } export default Keyboard;
